result.reason: Intel HD 520 foreground/focus loss is likely a driver-specific DWM interaction; need confirmation whether issue persists on current version given recent WndProc/resize fixes (#1666).
result.approach: Ask reporter to retest on v1.81.0-beta.2; if still reproducible, add WM_ACTIVATE handler in WndProc to call BringToFront()/Activate() on focus restore, or set TopMost temporarily on startup.
